message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll be very happy with it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I'm willing to pay that amount, but I'm not sure I can go any higher.

Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $12,000 is my bottom line. I know it's a quality product that will serve you well.  If you're unable to meet that price, I understand, but I'm not willing to go any lower.

I understand that you're not willing to go below $12,000, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay that much. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,500? I'm really interested in the product, and I think it's worth it to me at that price.
